catalog.name: Antarctic Mesoscale Prediction System (AMPS) WRF Outputs

dataset.name: Antarctic Mesoscale Prediction System (AMPS) WRF Outputs

documentation.xlink:title: NCAR GDEX - Antarctic Mesoscale Prediction System (AMPS) WRF Outputs(d473003)

metadata.documentation: The Antarctic Mesoscale Prediction System (AMPS) is a real-time numerical weather prediction capability that provides support for the United States Antarctic Program, Antarctic science, and international Antarctic efforts. The data in this dataset include a 6-month rotating archive of the output of the atmospheric forecast models in NetCDF format.
